name: Summer baseball cap·Yellow
chineseName: 夏日扶桑棒球帽·凤梨黄
description: Rebel Bandana with handsome backward Yellow baseball cap, looks surprisingly matching. Wear this to the beach and get a nice looking tan.

name: Summer Cap·Green
chineseName: 夏日向日葵遮阳帽·椰子绿
description: Green hat with a big brim which shield your tender skin against the scorching sunlight, the sunflower looks like a gift of some secret admirer.

name: Summer Cap·Ocean blue
chineseName: 夏日向日葵遮阳帽·海洋蓝
description: Blue hat with a big brim which shield your tender skin against the scorching sunlight, the sunflower looks like a gift of some secret admirer.

name: Summer Cap·Red
chineseName: 夏日向日葵遮阳帽·骄阳红
description: Red hat with a big brim which shield your tender skin against the scorching sunlight, the sunflower looks like a gift of some secret admirer.

name: Summer Cap·Yellow

description: Yellow hat with a big brim which shield your tender skin against the scorching sunlight, the sunflower looks like a gift of some secret admirer.

name: Summer festival gift box
description: Summer festival gift box given away by Kafra ladies, open to guaranteed receive a Kafra Summer cone, and chance to have ONE of the follow: Mora coin*1, Lightning Chain*1, Gold Medal*1, Guild's Gift*10, Seed of Mastela*1, Eden Coin*100

name: Summer Headwear series
description: Rebel Bandana with handsome backward baseball cap, looks surprisingly matching. Wear this to the beach and get a nice looking tan.

name: Summer Headwear series
description: Hat with a big brim which shield your tender skin against the scorching sunlight, the sunflower looks like a gift of some secret admirer.

name: Summer Penguin
description: This penguin under the summer sun is the definition of relaxation. When you lie on the floor, he won't just stand there. (Thank you for your purchase. This pretty adornment cannot be traded in the Exchange until the event is over~ From Ina, August, 2017)

name: Summer_Test Card Pack
description: A Card Pack for adventurers. Open it to receive 3 Cards of random quality.

name: Summer_Test Gratitude Pack
description: A Gratitude Pack for adventurers. Open it to receive Dead Branch x20, Eden Coin x6666, Gold Coin x8888, Card Pack x1.

name: Summon Syrup
description: The syrup that provides you with leadership skills. Drink it and you will be able to blow the battle horn, and Teleport your Party members from the Guild Battle and Arena to your side.

name: Summoner Coat
description: The wearer can feel the power of magic in his clothes, and his mind will become clear.

name: Summoner Coat [1]
description: The wearer can feel the power of magic in his clothes, and his mind will become clear.

name: Sun Back Headwear Shard
description: Shard of the legendary artifact: Sun God Back Headwear. A shard left on the battleground of gods. Collect materials and shards and go to Miss Futraca to restore it to its former glory!

name: Sun Hat Shard
description: Shard of the legendary artifact: Hat of the Sun God.  A shard left on the battleground of gods. Collect materials and shards and go to Miss Futraca to restore it to its former glory!

name: Sunday Hat
description: Hat that brings happiness when you put it on.

name: Sunday Hat Blueprint
description: Hat that brings happiness when you put it on.

name: Sunday Hat [1]
description: Hat that brings happiness when you put it on.
